Android App Bundle  Google  2018  IO Google Play CPU   APK APK  APK  ````  [](https://developer.android.google.cn/studio/projects/dynamic-delivery)

 Android App Bundle  ``Google Play `` [](https://developer.android.com/studio/publish/app-signing#enroll)

****

## 

 Android App Bundle App Bundle CPU Language  Apk Play Store  APK

![image](/images/2019/10/01.png)

armxhdpien_US APK base + arm + xhdpi + en.apk

/ Play Store  APK

##  Android App Bundle

### Android Studio 3.2 

>Android Studio --> Build --> Generate Signed Bundle/APK

![image](/images/2019/10/02.png)

![image](/images/2019/10/03.png)

### 

```
./gradlew bundleRelease
```

##  Android App Bundle

###  [bundletool](https://github.com/google/bundletool) 

bundletool  GradleAndroid Studio  Google Play  Android App Bundle  App Bundle  APK bundletool  APK  Google Play 

[GitHub ](https://github.com/google/bundletool/releases)

#### 1.  App Bundle  APK

 Android Studio  App Bundle  APK ``.apks`` 

>bundletool  APK  APK 

```
java -jar bundletool.jar build-apks 
--bundle=/MyApp/my_app.aab
--output=/MyApp/my_app.apks
--ks=/MyApp/keystore.jks
--ks-pass=file:/MyApp/keystore.pwd
--ks-key-alias=MyKeyAlias
--key-pass=file:/MyApp/key.pwd
```

#### 2.  APK 

 APK bundletool  APK 

```
java -jar bundletool.jar install-apks --apks=/MyApp/my_app.apks
```

> --device-id=serial-id 

#### 

 app  aab 

#### 

 bundletool  [](https://developer.android.com/studio/command-line/bundletool) 

###  App Bundle  Play 



>  -->  -->  -->  Android App Bundle --> 

 App Bundle  APK  APK 

>  -->  -->  -->  -->  APK

![image](/images/2019/10/06.png)

![image](/images/2019/10/04.png)

## 

### 

 App Play Store  App Bundle 

 App  build.gradle 

```
android {
    bundle {
        language {
            // Specifies that the app bundle should not support
            // configuration APKs for language resources. These
            // resources are instead packaged with each base and
            // dynamic feature APK.
            enableSplit = false
        }
    }
}
```

## 

 xml  fontFamily

```
<TextView
    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:text="Hello World!"
    android:fontFamily="@font/hind_siliguri_regular" />
```



```
Typeface typeface = ResourcesCompat.getFont(context, R.font.hind_siliguri_regular);
//  Typeface.BOLD
textView.setTypeface(typeface, Typeface.NORMAL);
```

## 

 styles.xml  App 
```
<!-- Base application theme. -->
<style name="AppTheme" parent="Theme.AppCompat.Light.DarkActionBar">

    ...

    <!---->
    <item name="android:fontFamily">@font/hind_siliguri_regular</item>
</style>
```
 AndroidManifest.xml 

```
<application
    android:allowBackup="true"
    android:icon="@mipmap/ic_launcher"
    android:label="@string/app_name"
    android:roundIcon="@mipmap/ic_launcher_round"
    android:supportsRtl="true"
    android:theme="@style/AppTheme">
    
    ...
    
</application>
```

android {

}

Post.title: BottomSheetDialog
Post._content:
BottomSheetDialog  behavior_peekHeight 

### 
```
<style name="BottomSheetDialog" parent="Theme.Design.Light.BottomSheetDialog">
    <item name="bottomSheetStyle">@style/bottomSheetStyleWrapper</item>
</style>

<style name="bottomSheetStyleWrapper" parent="Widget.Design.BottomSheet.Modal">
    <item name="behavior_peekHeight">500dp</item>
</style>

<!---->
BottomSheetDialog dialog = new BottomSheetDialog(this, R.style.BottomSheetDialog);
            dialog.setContentView(R.layout.layout_bottom_sheet);
            dialog.show();
```

### 

1. Dialog  RelativeLayout  ConstraintLayout, 
2.  match_parent
```
<RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
    android:id="@+id/rl_container"
    android:orientation="vertical"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:background="@color/text_white">

    <LinearLayout
        android:id="@+id/ll_address_top"
        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="match_parent"
        android:minHeight="?attr/actionBarSize"
        android:orientation="horizontal">
        
    </LinearLayout>

</RelativeLayout>

```
3. 

```
View parent = (View) mContentView.getParent();
if (parent != null) {
    BottomSheetBehavior mBehavior = BottomSheetBehavior.from(parent);
    DisplayMetrics displayMetrics = getContext().getResources().getDisplayMetrics();
    int screenHeight = displayMetrics.heightPixels;
    mBehavior.setPeekHeight((int) (screenHeight * 0.45));
    parent.setBackgroundColor(Color.TRANSPARENT);
}
```

        android:layout_width="match_parent"
        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
        android:minHeight="?attr/actionBarSize"
        android:orientation="horizontal">
        
    </LinearLayout>

</RelativeLayout>
```

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class Styles {

  static TextStyle boldTextStyle(Color color, double fontSize, {Color backgroundColor, double lineHeight}) {
    return TextStyle(
      fontSize: fontSize,
      color: color,
      fontWeight: FontWeight.bold,
      backgroundColor: backgroundColor,
      height: lineHeight,
    );
  }

  static TextStyle regularTextStyle(Color color, double fontSize, {Color backgroundColor, double lineHeight}) {
    return TextStyle(
      fontSize: fontSize,
      color: color,
      backgroundColor: backgroundColor,
      height: lineHeight,
    );
  }
}

    ),
```

Post.title: Flutter  aar  Maven
Post._content:
### 
 
1.  ``flutter pub get`` 
2.  flutter module  aar maven  release 
3.  aar  ``mvn deploy``  maven
4. 


### 

 ``android_build.sh`` 

```shell
#!/usr/bin/env bash

###############################################################
#  shell  mac 
# 
# ./android_build.sh 
#  `zsh: command not found: android_build.sh`
# 
# 1. vim ~/.zshrc
# 2.  # User configuration  `source ~/.bash_profile`
# 3. 
# 4. source ~/.zshrc
###############################################################

# 
set -e

# 
version=$1

###### 1. 
if [ ! -n  "$version" ]; then

echo ">>> !"

# 
exit
fi

###### 2. /

echo ">>>  flutter pub get!"

flutter pub get

###### 3. AAR

echo ">>>  ${version} release  aar !"

flutter build aar --no-debug --no-profile --build-number ${version}

echo ">>> "

###### 4.  maven

echo ">>>  Maven"

#  aar 
file_path="build/host/outputs/repo/com/chicdeals/flutter/flutter_release/$version/flutter_release-$version"

mvn deploy:deploy-file \
-s="mvn-settings.xml" \
-DpomFile="$file_path.pom" \
-DgeneratePom=true \

runApp(MaterialApp(

```

}
```

 ``command+s``  ``I10n.dart``  ``messages_en.dart`` 

I10n.dart:

```
class S {
  ...

  /// `ContactUs`
  String get contactUs {
    return Intl.message(
      'ContactUs',
      name: 'contactUs',
      desc: '',
      args: [],
    );
  }
}
```

messages_en.dart:

```
class MessageLookup extends MessageLookupByLibrary {
  String get localeName => 'en';

  final messages = _notInlinedMessages(_notInlinedMessages);
  static _notInlinedMessages(_) => <String, Function> {
    "contactUs" : MessageLookupByLibrary.simpleMessage("ContactUs")
  };
}
```

Post.title: Git
Post._content:
### Git

1. `git config --global user.name "Your Name"` ( git )

2. `git config --global user.email "Your email"` ()

3. `ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "youremail@example.com"` ( SSH key)

4. `ssh-agent -s` ( ssh )

5. `ssh -T git@github.com` ()

6. `git init` ()

7. `git add . `()

8. `git commit -m "write something title"` ()

9. `git status` ( git )

10. `git remote add origin git@github.com:github/github.git` ( github )

11. `git push -u origin master` ( git push)

12. `git clone URL` ()

13. `git branch` ()

15. `git checkout -- filename` ()

16. `git checkout name` (name )

17. `git reset --hard commitNumber` ( commit )

18. `git push --force` ()

19. `git tag` ( tag )

20. `git tag -d tagName` ( tag)

21. `git push origin --tags` ( tag )

### Git-Flow

1. `git flow init` ()

2. `git flow feature start MYFEATURE` ( Feature)

3. `git flow feature publish MYFEATURE` (Publish  Feature ( push ))

4. `git flow feature pull origin MYFEATURE` ( Publish  Feature)

5. `git flow feature finish MYFEATURE` ( Feature)

6. `git flow release start RELEASE [BASE]` ( Release)

7. `git flow release publish RELEASE` (Publish  Release)

8. `git flow release finish RELEASE ` ( Release)

9. `git push --tags` ( Release push )

10. `git flow hotfix start VERSION [BASENAME]` ( Hotfix)

11. `git flow hotfix finish VERSION` ( Hotfix)


### Git-Submodule

1. `git submodule add git@github.com:github/github.git` ( git )

2. `git submodule init` ( Submodule)

3. `git submodule update` ( Submodule)

### vim

1. `vim filename` ()

2.  `i`  ()

3.  `Esc`  ( `i` ())

4. `:wq` ()

5. `:q!` (,)

6. `:w filename` ( filename )

### Git-Flow 

![](/images/2017/01/03-1.png)

### Git Commit 

 git commit  commit   

[](http://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2016/01/commit_message_change_log.html)

 commit  message  type

 | 
----|----
feat | Feature
fix |  bug
style | 
build | Gradle 

> feat:

* [Git  - ](https://git-scm.com/book/zh/v2/Git-%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7-%E5%AD%90%E6%A8%A1%E5%9D%97)
* [Git submodule](http://blog.devtang.com/2013/05/08/git-submodule-issues/)

## 

```
FATAL Port 4000 has been used. Try other port instead.
FATAL Something's wrong. Maybe you can find the solution here: http://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html
```


```
sudo hexo s -p 5000
```

## Hexo 

1. ``hexo generate (hexo g)`` public
2. ``hexo server (hexo s)`` web
3. ``hexo deploy (hexo d)`` github, heroku
4. ``hexo new "postName"`` #
5. ``hexo new page "pageName"`` #

```
$ hexo n == hexo new
$ hexo g == hexo generate
$ hexo s == hexo server
$ hexo d == hexo deploy
```

##  GitHub

1. Install hexo-deployer-git.

```
$ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
```

2. Edit ``_config.yml`` (with example values shown below as comments):

```
deploy:
  type: git   
  repo: <repository url>  #https://bitbucket.org/JohnSmith/johnsmith.bitbucket.io
  branch: [branch] #published
  message: [message]  #leave this blank
```

Post._content:
Ubuntu18.04 Mac 

 frp  web 

## 

1. 
```
wget https://github.com/fatedier/frp/releases/download/v0.29.0/frp_0.29.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz
#  wget wget
yum -y install wget

#  frp 
tar -zxvf frp_0.29.0_linux_amd64.tar.gz
#  frp
mv frp_0.29.0_linux_amd64 frp
```
2. 
```
cd frp
chmod +x frps
# 
vim frps.ini
```

3.  frps.ini 
```
[common]
bind_port = 7000
auto_token=12345678
vhost_http_port = 8080
vhost_https_port = 443

dashboard_port = 7500
# dashboard  admin
dashboard_user = admin
dashboard_pwd = admin
```

###  supervisor,  supervisor

```
apt-cache search supervisor
apt-get install supervisor
```

### Python selenium 

https://huilansame.github.io/huilansame.github.io/archivers/sleep-implicitlywait-wait


```
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
from selenium import webdriver
from selenium.webdriver.support.wait import WebDriverWait
from selenium.webdriver.support import expected_conditions as EC
from selenium.webdriver.common.by import By

driver = webdriver.Firefox()
driver.implicitly_wait(10)  # 
driver.get('https://huilansame.github.io')
locator = (By.LINK_TEXT, 'CSDN')

try:
    WebDriverWait(driver, 20, 0.5).until(EC.presence_of_element_located(locator))
    print driver.find_element_by_link_text('CSDN').get_attribute('href')
finally:
    driver.close()
    
```

        print(val['h'])
```

Post._content: ### RTL RTL Right-to-left() RTL LTR | RTL ----|---- ![](/images/2017/06/01-2.jpg) | ![](/images/2017/06/01-3.jpg) Android Android 4.2 SDK 17 RTL LTR ### name | desc | chinese ---- | ---- | --- android:layoutDirection | attribute for setting the direction of a component's layout | android:textDirection | attribute for setting the direction of a component's text | android:textAlignment | attribute for setting the alignment of a component's text | getLayoutDirectionFromLocale() | method for getting the Locale-specified direction | ### AndroidManifest.xml application ``` ... ``` ### [change-language-programmatically-in-android](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2900023/change-language-programmatically-in-android) : [what-is-the-list-of-supported-languages-locales-on-android](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7973023/what-is-the-list-of-supported-languages-locales-on-android) updateConfiguration Api 25 , [](https://github.com/DroidKaigi/conference-app-2017/pull/315/files) ``` String languageToLoad = "ar"; // your language Resources res = getResources(); DisplayMetrics dm = res.getDisplayMetrics(); Locale locale = new Locale(languageToLoad); Locale.setDefault(locale); Configuration config = new Configuration(); config.locale = locale; res.updateConfiguration(conf, dm); ``` ### AS AS RTL Layout Left Right Start End paddingStartmarginStart) Start LTR Left RTL RightAPI 17 Left StartAndroid 4.2 4.2 > Refactor > Add RTL Support Where Possible... ### | ------ | ------ [gradle-android-rtl](https://github.com/znyang/gradle-android-rtl) | RTL AS - AS - padding ### #### EditText EditText [set-a-consistent-style-to-all-edittext-for-e-g](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10903647/set-a-consistent-style-to-all-edittext-for-e-g ) ``` android:textAlignment="viewStart" android:gravity="start" ``` style.xml EditText ``` ``` #### TextView TextView RTL :[setting-global-styles-for-views-in-android](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/3078081/setting-global-styles-for-views-in-android) ``` ``` ### RTL ``` TextUtilsCompat.getLayoutDirectionFromLocale(Locale.getDefault()) == LayoutDirection.RTL ``` ### , ``` Collections.reverse(List list); ``` ### setMargins ``` FrameLayout.LayoutParams params = new FrameLayout.LayoutParams( ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT, ViewGroup.LayoutParams.WRAP_CONTENT); params.setMargins(10, 0, 10, 0); params.setMarginEnd(10); ``` ### ViewPager : [tabs-swipe-direction-in-right-to-left-android-app](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37196714/tabs-swipe-direction-in-right-to-left-android-app) > Android RTLViewPager GitHub ViewPager RTL, [](https://github.com/diego-gomez-olvera/RtlViewPager) ### WebView Android7.0 WebView App --> App --> App --> web --> toolbar `` WebView Activity new WebView(this).destroy()`` [android-webview-language-changes-abruptly-on-android-7-0-and-above](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/40398528/android-webview-language-changes-abruptly-on-android-7-0-and-above) ### 1. LinearLayout FrameLayout layout_gravity 2. item ItemDecoration 3. 4. mipmap-ldrtl-xxxhdpi 5. , anim-ldrtl 6. paddingLeftdrawableLeft RTL paddingStartdrawableStart 7. AS 8. EditText android:layoutDirection="locale" TextInputLayout android:textDirection="locale" android:textAlignment="viewStart" 9. TextView android:textAlignment="viewStart viewEnd" android:textDirection="locale" 10. RecyclerView StaggeredGridLayoutManager 11. String.xml , d% %d, , Toast SpannableString %d ### 1. 2. 3. layout-ldrtl ### 1. https://android-developers.googleblog.com/2013/03/native-rtl-support-in-android-42.html 2. https://medium.com/@zhangqichuan/rtl-support-in-android-898e11f31561 3. https://mobikul.com/just-few-steps-to-make-your-app-rtl-supportable/ 4. https://blog.robustastudio.com/featured/android-rtl-support/ 5. http://blog.csdn.net/figo0423/article/details/50241363 6. http://blog.csdn.net/wxx614817/article/details/50586388 7. http://jiajixin.cn/2016/10/08/android_adapt_rtl/ 8. http://www.apkbus.com/blog-327085-57866.html 9. http://droidyue.com/blog/2014/07/07/support-rtl-in-android/index.html 10. http://chuansong.me/n/920084451521
